sentences.en: All the chicks have hatched out.
As soon as the two chicks hatch, they leave the nest burrow.
sentences.cn: 两只小鸟一出壳就离开了巢穴。

sentences.en: During these periods the birds will lie on the cage floor as if trying to lay or hatch eggs.
sentences.cn: 这些时期，鸟儿会趴在笼底，好像在下蛋或孵蛋。

sentences.en: Five trays of eggs would hatch out a huge number of silkworms.
sentences.cn: 三张蚕种,该可以采多少茧子呢?

sentences.en: Have you been hatching up a deal with her?
sentences.cn: 你是不是在和她密谋什么交易？

sentences.en: He stuck his head up through the hatch.
No one knows how the new plan will hatch out.
sentences.cn: 谁也不知道这新方案将怎样制订出来.

sentences.en: The bird mistook the pebble for egg and tried to hatch it.
sentences.cn: 这只鸟错把卵石当蛋,想去孵它.

sentences.en: The chicks hatch out after fifteen days.
sentences.cn: 小鸡过十五天就孵出来了.

sentences.en: The eggs eventually hatch inside the mother's pouch.
sentences.cn: 卵最后在母兽的育儿袋内孵化了.

sentences.en: The eggs hatch after a week or ten days.
The eggs quickly hatch into larvae.
The eggs take three days to hatch.
sentences.cn: 这些蛋要三天时间才能孵化。

sentences.en: The female sits on the eggs until they hatch.
sentences.cn: 雌鸟伏在蛋上直到其孵化。

sentences.en: The problems do not end if crocodiles successfully hatch from the eggs.
sentences.cn: 即使鳄鱼成功地从卵中孵化出来，这些问题也不会终止。

sentences.en: Uneasy but eager, the whole family waited for the eggs to hatch.
sentences.cn: 全家都是惴惴不安地又很兴奋地等候“收蚕”.

sentences.en: When the eggs hatch the larvae eat the living flesh of the host animal.
sentences.cn: 当卵孵化后，幼虫取食寄主的鲜肉。

sentences.en: When will the baby chickens hatch out?

words.tran_cn: 人工孵化的鱼苗或小鸟
孵化；策划（hatch的过去分词形式）
[禽] 孵化；给…加影线；策划（hatch的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 格子信号，交叉影线；网纹网状线剖面线，网纹网状线
(非正式)干杯（饮酒前朋友之间的互祝之词）

trans.tran_en: a hole in a ship or aircraft, usually used for loading goods, or the door that covers it
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out
